x.positioning: High-velocity insight and strong contrarian hooks.
best_practices: Lead with one sharp claim in the first line.
Use short lines with momentum and curiosity gaps.
Thread format should escalate to a practical takeaway.
End with one clear CTA or question.

threads.positioning: Warm, conversational thought leadership with less aggression than X.
best_practices: Use human tone and vulnerability where relevant.
Keep advice practical and relatable.
Prioritize clarity over hype language.
Open with a tension or hard-earned lesson.
Use short paragraph cadence ('bro-etry') for readability.
Tie story to business outcomes and specific actions.
Close with a discussion question.
Meta update note: LinkedIn is now prioritizing PDF carousels

instagram.positioning: Visual-first value with concise, punchy copy.
best_practices: Hook in first sentence of caption.
Pair educational point with strong visual metaphor.
Use concise line breaks and 10-30 relevant hashtags.

pinterest.positioning: Search-intent friendly inspiration and how-to utility.
best_practices: Design for saved value (checklists, templates, before/after).
Use keyword-rich pin descriptions.
Prioritize evergreen clarity over trends.

tiktok.positioning: Immediate visual hook and narrative movement every few seconds.
best_practices: Hook in 0.5-2 seconds.
Use pattern interrupts and fast scene progression.
Keep language simple, direct, and emotionally specific.

youtube_shorts.positioning: Compact educational entertainment with high retention pacing.
best_practices: State payoff early and repeat progress markers.
Use dense value per second with visual proof.
End with loop-friendly closing or follow-up teaser.

instagram_reels.positioning: Aesthetic + utility blend with social proof tone.
best_practices: Use clean visual composition and direct on-screen text.
Keep scenes tight and outcomes tangible.
Caption should convert attention into comments/saves.
Respect subreddit norms and avoid overt selling.
Lead with context, ask for feedback, invite disagreement.
Show practical details, not generic claims.
Use relatable framing and clear prompts for comments.
Prioritize stories and practical life/business relevance.
Ask one direct engagement question.
